short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sprunki Phase 1 is a musical game that allows players to create and mix their beats using a variety of quirky characters and sounds

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sprunki Phase 1 is a musical game that allows players to create and mix their own beats using a variety of quirky characters and sounds. It takes creativity to the next level, making music enjoyable for everyone.
